comment._content: On June 28, 2011, vigliante suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 21369373@N00
comment._content:
What a great shot. Thanks for putting all these up. I've spent hours just looking how the world has changed. 

The amount of clothing folk wore to the beach is - stunning.
